title: Handle a Fare Evasion Incident
description: A fare inspector finds a passenger on a train without a valid ticket. The inspector must issue a citation.

tasks.description: The inspector asks the passenger for their ticket and finds they do not have one.
The inspector requests the passenger's identification.
Using a handheld device, the inspector enters the passenger's information and issues a citation for fare evasion.
tasks.expected_outcome: A citation is generated and printed.

tasks.description: The incident is logged in the system for tracking.
tasks.expected_outcome: The citation is recorded in the compliance database.
